website_summaries.verdict: Classic makeup powder puffs that you can use to replace your compact puff.
pros: Soft and small, so they are made for applying and blending makeup
cons: Not designed for applying body powder
Don't work very well with loose powder

customer_reviews.title: Getting harder to find in stores
customer_reviews.text: These are thin compact powder puffs that fit in compacts. My mother loves these and likes to change out her compact puffs weekly. So I purchased several packets for her Christmas stocking. She was very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon G.

customer_reviews.title: perfect compact size
customer_reviews.text: Can't find these in the typical discount/drug stores anymore. Not surprising folks buy mostly online since virtually all needs and wants can be found on amazon. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: speckled hen

customer_reviews.title: Fit Nicely in a Powder Compact
customer_reviews.text: These puffs fit perfectly in a powder compact. They aren't thick. They're thinner which is nice They are like the ones you get in a new compact. Just what my wife wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glad I found these
customer_reviews.text: As others have said, it's hard to find these in stores. Wal-Mart only carries those sponge wedges. Use to get these at Dollar General but they stopped stocking them. I buy cheap conpacts at Dollar Tree and the applicator is a paper thin flimsy sponge that I instantly throw out so I need puffs that work, new, clean ones. These are the perfect size and thickness.
customer_reviews.author: LLC

customer_reviews.title: So happy to have found a powder puff that fits into a compact.
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers have mentioned, it's difficult to find a powder puff these days that will actually fit in a powder compact. After a while, the original ones aren't as clean anymore, but the ones in the store are too big, or they are a "sponge-type" of material. This is the perfect size, is soft and distributes powder evenly, and is not thin and flimsy. A good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: rainier88

customer_reviews.title: I love these puffs, so soft. Cotton.
customer_reviews.text: I like these puffs, they will fit into your compact, it is hard to judge the size of the puff just by reading the size. I have purchased some before and they were way too large. I cannot find these in stores anymore. I came to Amazon and here they are. No more searching isles in drugstores anymore.
customer_reviews.author: CALLIOPE

customer_reviews.title: Try this instead...
customer_reviews.text: Got this to use for my setting/finishing powder instead of my brush. O my. What a difference. It gave my skin a more flawless look from nowhere. It was crazy...in a great way! Try it, you won't be disappointed. Remember, this is what women used before there were brushes!
customer_reviews.author: Carleenie

customer_reviews.title: Would Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Was hesitant to buy this kind of product because not all puffs are made the same. Was very pleasantly surprised at the quality of these. They were exactly what I was looking for and expected. Would for sure purchase again, if I needed more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Fabric powder pads
customer_reviews.text: Overall, these are what I was looking for to replace a compact powder pad - similar to the fabric pads in covergirl. My only complaint about these is the ribbon on the back is awkward to hold, still works just took me a little bit to figure out a comfortable way to hold it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy P

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than pictured. They fit in a compact. I saw that in description & wasn’t sure watch it meant. For my purposes, they’re just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Dani Krogstad

customer_reviews.title: it's simply the best out there
customer_reviews.text: Been using this brand for over a decade, would not use anything else, it's simply the best out there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft Cotton And Smooth Application
customer_reviews.text: It is difficult to find cotton puffs in the stores. I don’t like the spongy puffs that come with compact powders. So happy I found these on Amazon. They are soft cotton, and apply powder/blush nicely.
customer_reviews.author: FAH

customer_reviews.title: Just what i needed
customer_reviews.text: It does what it suppose to, good quality great price. I will buy more when i use these all up.
customer_reviews.author: vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Good price and work well
customer_reviews.text: Very soft but not too soft as to leave lint or fall apart as several do. And the price is great! Will continue to order these as I need them
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say about these useful cosmetic pads other than great quality, soft, and great for foundation application.
customer_reviews.author: K.ROB

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and just as good as the ones that initially come with the powder! Very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Brad & Catherine

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Exactally as described. These are more expensive in the store, so you are getting a great value.
customer_reviews.author: mardee

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for - a nice soft little powder puff at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Small soft affordable
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fact that they are small but very soft and affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Patti A Supino

customer_reviews.title: Perfect !
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for without going to a retail store
customer_reviews.author: Rina

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: As pressed powder puffs go - these are a great quality.
customer_reviews.author: TreeSoul

customer_reviews.title: Do not trust the pictures
customer_reviews.text: I just got shocked after seeing the product directly. In fact, I was actually searching for the product when my package arrived. They are very tiny to use just like cotton swabs.
customer_reviews.author: Kiran Basa

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for 👀
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with my purchase. I use pressed powder and like to change puff pads regularly, so as to keep my skin clean and clear. These were exactly what I was looking for, and I will definitely be ordering more.. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: TRUSTED PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Nice quantity and softness. Wish there was still a black puff offered.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Rorie

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: you can not find a powder puff anywhere in town. So glad Amazon had these. Super soft and just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Erke

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product is really good I love the puff because it's just right takes the oils right off your face and doesn't dry your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Gloria Patricia Holmes-Smith

customer_reviews.title: It soft comfortable and good
customer_reviews.text: I laket this pads I recommendthem to my friends an i got one more for my mother thankyoufor your business
customer_reviews.author: Natali

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping that the puff would have been a little bit larger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FIT
customer_reviews.text: This powder puff fits my Revlon compact perfectly. Very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: CAROLE GERRAPUTA

customer_reviews.title: These are impossible to find in drugstores
customer_reviews.text: A powder compact is convenient for eliminating shine during the day, and replacement puffs are so necessary! Love these!
customer_reviews.author: conSuemer

customer_reviews.title: Peach fuzz shreds from puff
customer_reviews.text: Fuzziness comes off the puff and sheds on to face and makeup. Will not be reordering.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: This was not the item I thought I was getting. Wanted a loose powder puff, not pressed powder. Just found out I cannot return them either. $5 wasted.
customer_reviews.author: L. Litton

customer_reviews.title: Small & Cheap
customer_reviews.text: These are super small and flimsy. The picture is very misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy.
customer_reviews.text: Received this product in the mail and it was EMPTY. There were no puffs in the packaging...
customer_reviews.author: brammerk093

customer_reviews.title: WORTH Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I stumbled upon these! I have searched 3 different well known stores in my city and haven't found anything remotely as good. I'll be buying more of these within the next few weeks. What I love about them is that it doesn't steal all of the makeup. I was using some other cotton puffs and half of my makeup would end up on the cotton puff. Really?! Why?! NoThanks! Not with these though...SO happy! Another plus is that the makeup will also stay on my face much, much longer.
customer_reviews.author: MarkToMarket

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great deal for very soft compact puffs - something that is extremely difficult to find in department stores. I have purchased the actual Covergirl puffs for my Covergirl compact but these are exactly the same puffs without the Covergirl name on them. Very soft and also durable after lots of use. Seller ships quickly.
customer_reviews.author: cracky bean

customer_reviews.title: Best Powder puffs for a compact
customer_reviews.text: These compact puffs are wonderful and I cannot find them in drugstores anymore. I am so grateful to Amazon for making them available online. I love having a clean compact puff to apply my pressed powder daily.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Beaman

customer_reviews.title: Soft!
customer_reviews.text: I was so glad to find these. I don't know what to say other than I love these. The powder goes on great with these. So much better than the sponges that are on the market today.
customer_reviews.author: Tammie

customer_reviews.title: They seem fine to me.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because every store I looked in I could not find my normal covergirl ones for my compacts. These fit (I use a normal pressed powder round compact). Nice.
customer_reviews.author: rachael

customer_reviews.title: The perfect size for a compact
customer_reviews.text: These are great replacements for the worn out puff in your compact. They're soft and work just as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Cleatta R. Morris

customer_reviews.title: This puffs is a little too thick to fit comfortably in most compacts
customer_reviews.text: Two reasons for 3 stars. This puffs is a little too thick to fit comfortably in most compacts. Also it’s pricey. Will go back to Walmart. Otherwise good construction and works fine
customer_reviews.author: linda greenberg

customer_reviews.title: Glad I can order these on amazon
customer_reviews.text: Powder puffs are a hard item to find these days where everyone’s using sponge type things. But I have used good ole fashioned powder puffs for years and want to keep using them. these are perfectly fine and easy to order on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: cheri

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little puff
customer_reviews.text: Great little puff. Perfect compact size. Really soft. My favorite compact powder makeup changed to a sponge pad which didn’t glide very well. These glide very smoothly across my Face.
customer_reviews.author: Just a little Sass

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Replacements for the powder puff that comes with a compact. The puff gets an accumulate of oil, face moisturizer or sun block on it over time, and I can just replace the dirty puff with a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan V. Madison

customer_reviews.title: Package open and missing items not worth it to return it very unhappy
customer_reviews.text: The package was opened in the envelope and two puffs were missing. But it is not worth the aggravation to return it !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replace for vintage compacts.
customer_reviews.text: I collect vintage loose powder compacts and use them daily. These puffs work perfectly as replacements. They are soft, pick up just enough product.
customer_reviews.author: Capless

customer_reviews.title: Soft and we’ll made Powder Puffs
customer_reviews.text: The puffs are very soft , fit well in my powder compact. Easy to order and quick shipping. These powder puffs will hold up well too.
customer_reviews.author: Honey

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good I needed some new ones and these work perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Classic lyric

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: They are powder puffs and they work for applying powder from a compact.
customer_reviews.author: Danamarie

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Thicker than I wanted. My powder compact can’t close. But other wise good!
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen Harwood

customer_reviews.title: Soft and fits in standard compacts
customer_reviews.text: Used to replace puff from Lancôme compact.Fit in compact just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: replacement for makeup
customer_reviews.text: This is a good replacement for the ones in your make up ...I don't care for the sponges. these don't last long before they start to keep bacterial but a good deal for me.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It’s hard to grab wish it had a different fabric on the back
customer_reviews.author: Marine

customer_reviews.title: Quality exquisite
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with this product 👌. Very hard to find. Fits perfectly in all my compacts.
customer_reviews.author: rab

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Puffs
customer_reviews.text: Less expensive and equivalent quality to Cover Girl Make Up Puffs.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Worley

customer_reviews.title: the product was exactly as described and arrived in good condition, just an FYI for anyone wanting it ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this to try and find a cheaper version for my Mary Kay compact, it was as bit too big but I made it work. Nothing against the seller, the product was exactly as described and arrived in good condition, just an FYI for anyone wanting it for a Mary Kay compact.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect size to fit inside of a compact. Nice and small.The side for the face is soft and picks up just enough of my solid powder. The hand side is like satin. I would not hesitate to hand wash them even though they come in a package of four.
customer_reviews.author: jrmcbm

product_meta.title: Victoria Vogue Round Puff Pressed Powder Puff, 4 Ea, 4count
product_meta.description: Size:(1 Pack)Victoria Vogue Round puff pressed powder puff, cosmetic powder puffs. The sense of touch is soft. Can be used as makeup remover. Convenient to take and bring for its portability.
feature_bullets: Face powder puff is fresh and Easy to use.
Keep makeup in place for a longer period of time.
